      • setAllowTeleportation

        public static void setAllowTeleportation(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                         boolean state)
        Sets whether an Entity is allowed to teleport upon entering a portal right now. This state is live-updated based on whether the Entity moved into/away from a portal.
        Parameters:
        entity - to set it for
        state - to set to
